org.plexian.grumy.entity

Class AABB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plexian.grumy.entity.AABB

  • public class AABB
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the required methods and fields to test and run collisions with objects.
    Author:
    walt

    • Method Detail

      • collides

        public static boolean collides(AABB a,
                               AABB b)
        Check if two AABBs collide.
        Parameters:
        a - The first AABB.
        b - The second AABB.
        Returns:
        True if there is a collision between a & b, false if not

      • inside

        public static boolean inside(AABB a,
                             Vector2d b)
        Check if point b is inside AABB a.
        Parameters:
        a - The AABB object.
        b - The point to check.
        Returns:
        True if point b is inside a, false if not.

        Resize the AABB.
        Parameters:
